reviewText: One of the best Rare Production
Great video for defensive driving classes

I buy this every time a new edition is made. I am a Therapist and owner of an addiction treatment program. Live in remote area where a Victims Panel is not available for DUII offenders. Red Asphalt is used in place of that. Great tool, will continue to buy this product. Thank you for the time, effort and affordability of this tool!
Excellent training video to help drivers learn safety! Moderate price spent for this training tool as compared to other options. Great shock effect!
